overview:
Scott Sparvero is Chief Executive Officer and Co-Founder of iland Internet Solutions. Mr. Sparvero co-founded iland in 1995 with Brian Ussher, President. Initially created to provide websites and storefronts, iland grew as the Internet expanded, and network security demands intensified. Mr. Sparvero led iland to become a global provider of hosted VMware solutions, managed colocation and high speed IP network and data services for high-bandwidth customers, including SaaS, content providers, Fortune 1000 companies and technology start-ups. Mr. Sparvero oversees the execution of all aspects of the company’s sales, marketing, financial and operational services and along with Mr. Usher, is responsible for iland’s strategic direction and growth as a global provider of cloud infrastructure solutions.

Prior to iland, Mr. Sparvero pursued a medical degree and interned as a Research Technician at the Dana Farber Cancer Institute in Boston where he authored two research papers published in the Journal of Molecular Biology and in Regulatory Molecular Biology.
